original_text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together, as the manner of some is; but exhorting one another: and so much the more, as ye see the day approaching.
korean_text: 모이기를 폐하는 어떤 사람들의 습관과 같이 하지 말고 오직 권하여 그 날이 가까움을 볼수록 더욱 그리하자

sentences.original_text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 함께 모이는 것을 버리지 말고

sentences.original_text: as the manner of some is
as ye see the day approaching
